text: The first season of Australian reality television series House Rules, also known as House Rules 2013, was commissioned in 2012 and began airing on 14 May 2013. The series is produced by the team who created the Seven reality show My Kitchen Rules and is hosted by Johanna Griggs. House Rules places six teams renovating each other's homes and further challenges for the ultimate prize of a full mortgage payment. ==Contestant Teams== This season of House Rules introduced six new teams. All teams are from different states in Australia. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;” |- valign="top" ! # ! Team ! Ages ! House ! Relationship ! Mortgage |- ! scope="col" style="background; color:black;" | 1 | Carly Schulz & Leighton Brow | 31 & 32 | Adelaide, SA | Couple Two Years ! $460,000 |- ! scope="col" style="background:; color:black;" | 2 | Michelle & Steve Ball | 48 | Sydney, NSW | Married 27 Years ! $629,000 |- ! scope="col" style="background:; color:black;" | 3 | Jemma & Ben Van Ryt | 26 & 27 | Perth, WA | Just Married ! $545,000 |- ! scope="col" style="background:; color:black;" | 4 | Nick & Chris Stavropoulos | 22 & 27 | Melbourne, VIC | Brothers ! $524,000 |- ! scope="col" style="background:; color:black;" | 5 | Amy Garrett & Sean Cornish | 30 & 26 | Brisbane, QLD | Engaged ! $300,000 |- ! scope="col" style="background:; color:black;" | 6 | Jane Polley & Plinio Taurian | | Hobart, TAS | Married with children ! $315,000 |} ==Elimination history== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; font-size: 9pt; line-height:16px; width:80%" |+ Teams' progress through the competition | style="width:10%; text-align:right;" rowspan="2"|Phase: ! colspan="7"| ! At the end of each renovation, the highest scoring team received an advantage for the next renovation, and lowest scoring receiving a disadvantage. At the end, all scores were tallied up and the team with lowest overall total was eliminated from the competition. ====Western Australia: Jemma & Ben==== * Episodes 1 to 4 * Airdate — 14 to 20 May 2013 * Description — Teams head to the first renovation at Jemma & Ben's 1950s home in Perth, Western Australia. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 1 ! colspan="7" | Perth, Western Australia |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="6"| Make it feel 'now' with an edge |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="6"| Create a kitchen/dining area we can party in |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Style a beauty room fit for a princess |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| No bright annoying colours |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Give us leather and chandeliers |- style="border-top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 8 || 8 || 9 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 25 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 6 || 7 | 20 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 20 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 7 || 6 | 19 | style="border- left:3px solid #aaa;"| 19 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 6 || 6 | 17 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 17 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 3 || 3 || 4 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 10 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| — |- |} ====Tasmania: Jane & Plinio==== * Episodes 5 to 8 * Airdate — 21 to 27 May 2013 * Description — Teams head off to the second renovation at Jane & Plinio's 1930s home in Hobart, Tasmania. Two bedrooms belong to their children Jarra, 16 years old & Nina, eight years old. **Previous winner's advantage: Carly & Leighton — They got to decide on which zone they wanted to renovate **Previous loser's disadvantage: Amy & Sean — Camping in the back yard in a tent during the renovation. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 2 ! colspan="7" | Hobart, Tasmania |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="6"| Make us an entry to remember |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="6"| Show off our books in a study nook |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Give us a family-friendly kitchen |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| Deliver Danish design with an art deco twist |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Keep it eco friendly |- style="border-top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 8 || 7 || 6 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 31 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 7 || 8 | 20 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 40 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 6 || 6 | 19 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 44 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 7 || 7 | 19 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 36 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 4 || 5 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 15 / 30 |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 19 / 30 |- |} ====Victoria: Nick & Chris==== * Episodes 9 to 12 * Airdate — 28 May to 3 June 2013 * Description — Teams travel to Nick & Chris's 1970s home in Melbourne, Victoria for the third renovation. **Previous winner's advantage: Amy & Sean — They got to decide on which zone they wanted to renovate **Previous loser's disadvantage: Jemma & Ben — Camping in the back yard in a tent during the renovation. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 3 ! colspan="7" | Melbourne, Victoria |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="6"| Give us MAD MEN cool |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="6"| Colour our palette moody and murky |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Put a retro divider between the entrance and the lounge |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| Style our kitchen bold and dramatic |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Take some risks |- style="border- top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 8 || 10 || 10 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 43 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 9 || 10 | 25 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 56 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 7 || 6 | 20 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 39 / 60 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 4 || 7 || 5 | 16 | style="border- left:3px solid #aaa;"| 52 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 4 || 5 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 58 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 40 / 60 |- |} ====South Australia: Carly & Leighton==== * Episodes 13 to 16 * Airdate — 4 to 10 June 2013 * Description — Teams head to Carly & Leighton's 1950s home in Adelaide, South Australia for the fourth renovation. **Previous winner's advantage: Jemma & Ben — They got to decide on which zone they wanted to renovate **Previous loser's disadvantage: Michelle & Steve — Although Carly & Leighton were the lowest scoring team in the previous week, they do not participate in the renovation of their own home and because Jemma and Ben got the highest score they got to choose who went into the tent and they chose Michelle and Steve. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font- size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 4 ! colspan="7" | Adelaide, South Australia |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="6"| Use stone and wood but don't give us rustic |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="6"| Make a "splash" in the entry |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Draw a palette from nature |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| Give us a versatile island we can dine at |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Fit out the family room with a sandstone fireplace |- style="border-top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border- left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 8 || 8 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 66 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 7 || 8 | 20 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 76 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 5 || 5 | 17 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 57 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 5 || 6 | 17 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 69 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 4 || 6 || 6 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 55 / 90 |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 58 / 90 |- |} ====Queensland: Amy & Sean==== * Episodes 17 to 20 * Airdate — 11 to 17 June 2013 * Description — Teams travel to Brisbane, Queensland to renovate Amy & Sean's 1950s home for the fifth renovation. **Previous winner's advantage: Jemma & Ben — They got to decide on which zone they wanted to renovate **Previous loser's disadvantage: Jane & Plinio — Camping in the back yard in a tent during the renovation. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 5 ! colspan="7" | Brisbane, Queensland |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Create an industrial-style kitchen with rustic warmth |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| Incorporate wall panelling and fretwork arches |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Make it warm, welcoming and positive |- style="border-top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 8 || 10 || 10 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 97 / 150 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 9 || 9 | 24 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 90 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 8 || 8 | 21 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 79 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 6 || 6 | 19 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 74 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 4 || 5 | | style="border- left:3px solid #aaa;"| 72 / 120 |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 76 / 120 |- |} ====New South Wales: Michelle & Steve==== * Episodes 21 to 24 * Airdate — 18 to 24 June 2013 * Description — Teams travel to Sydney, New South Wales to renovate Michelle & Steve's 1950s family home in the sixth and final interior renovation. Two bedrooms belong to their children; daughter Alex, 20 years old & son Jesse, 18 years old. The lowest scoring team overall will be eliminated. **Previous winner's advantage: None - Michelle & Steve came first in the last renovation, but due to this renovation being their home they are not involved in the renovation, therefore there is no winner advantage. **Previous loser's disadvantage: Nick & Chris — Camping in the back yard in a tent during the renovation. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation 6 ! colspan="7" | Sydney, New South Wales |- ! colspan="7"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="6"| Create a relaxed family beach house |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="6"| Make it bright and airy with lime-washed floors |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="6"| Add a touch of Morocco in artwork and tiles |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="6"| Bring Waikiki in our kitchen |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="6"| Give us a deep spa bath to relax in |- style="border- top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="3" style="width:40%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%;"| ! rowspan="2" style="width:10%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Homeowner ! style="width:10%;"| Joe ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 10 || 9 || 9 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;" bgcolor="lightgreen" | 1st (107) |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 3 || 7 || 6 | 16 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 2nd (106) |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 7 || 8 | 22 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 3rd (98) |- | style="width:15%;"| | colspan="5" | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 4th (97) |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 4 || 7 || 7 | 18 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 5th (90) |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 5 || 5 | | style="border- left:3px solid #aaa;" bgcolor="pink" | 6th (89) |- |} ===Phase 2: 24 Hour Fix- Up=== * Episode 25 * Airdate — 25 June 2013 * Description — Each team returned to their own home and had to re-invent one of the zones in 24 hours. Teams must stick to a budget of $5000 and must stay together at all times. The lowest scoring team will be eliminated. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation summary ! colspan="5" | 24 Hour Fix-Up |- ! colspan="5"| House Rules |- ! Rule 1 | colspan="5"| You have 24 hours |- ! Rule 2 | colspan="5"| You have a budget of $5000 |- ! Rule 3 | colspan="5"| You may work on one zone only |- ! Rule 4 | colspan="5"| Make the zone reflect your style |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="5"| You must stay together at all times |- |- style="border-top:3px solid #aaa;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="2" style="width:30%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:20%;| |- ! style="width:15%;"| Joe ! style="width:15%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 9 || 9 | bgcolor="lightgreen"| 18 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 8 || 7 | 15 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 8 | 15 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 6 | 12 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 6 || 5 | bgcolor="pink"| 11 |} ===Phase 3: Gardens and Exteriors=== The top 4 teams are challenged to transform the exteriors and gardens of each other's homes. Two teams are allocated to a home (that does not belong to them) and must renovate either the front or back yards, as well as improving the house exterior. For each house, the owners also left an exclusive item that must be used in the zone. The semifinals are held over two rounds and after both rounds are complete, the two lowest scoring team are eliminated. ====Round 1==== * Episode 26 * Airdate — 26 & 27 June 2013 * Description — In round 1 of the exterior renovations, the 4 remaining teams head to Sydney and Adelaide to transform the gardens and house exterior in 3 and a half days. Teams are allocated to the front or back yard of either Michelle & Steve's or Carly & Leighton's house. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation summary ! colspan="3" | Round 1 |- ! style="width:15%;"| House Rules ! style="width:40%;"| Michelle & Steve's (NSW) ! style="width:40%;"| Carly & Leighton's (SA) |- ! Rule 1 | Give us a resort-style entrance | |- ! Rule 2 | Build a BBQ deck in the backyard | Create a secluded haven in our backyard |- ! Rule 3 | | Modernise our front yard and extend the carport |- ! Rule 4 | Light up our nights with a fire pit | Create an outdoor cinema |- ! Rule 5 | colspan="2"| Choose your zone: front or back |- |} {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" ! rowspan="2"| Team ! rowspan="2"| House ! rowspan="2" style="width:40%;"| Zone ! colspan="2" style="width:30%;"| Scores ! rowspan="2" style="width:15%;| ! rowspan="2" style="width:15%; border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| |- ! style="width:10%;"| Jim ! style="width:10%;"| Wendy |- | style="width:15%;"| | rowspan=2 style="width:15%;"| (Sydney, NSW) | | 6 || 7 | 13 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 13 / 20 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 7 || 7 | 14 | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 14 / 20 |- | style="width:15%;"| | rowspan=2 style="width:15%;"| (Adelaide, SA) | | 7 || 8 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 15 / 20 |- | style="width:15%;"| | | 5 || 6 | | style="border-left:3px solid #aaa;"| 11 / 20 |} ====Round 2==== * Episodes 27 * Airdate — 30 June 2013 * Description — The teams continue on to round 2 of the exterior renovations in Perth and Melbourne to transform the gardens and house exterior in 3 and a half days. Teams are allocated to the front or back yard of either Jemma & Ben's or Nick & Chris' house. At the end of this round, the two lowest scoring teams will be eliminated. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation summary ! colspan="3" | Round 2 |- ! style="width:15%;"| House Rules ! style="width:40%;"| Jemma & Ben's (WA) ! style="width:40%;"| Nick & Chris' (VIC) |- ! The Australian public voted for their favourite team to win. The winner was decided by the public votes. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%; width:65em;" |+ Renovation Summary ! colspan="4" | Grand Final |- !
